# Instruments

# Mixins

playMelodically

Play a group of notes melodically. If resolve is true the melody will resolve to the tonic in higher octave.

playNotes

Play a group of notes Harmonically.

# playMelodically

Play a group of notes melodically. If resolve is true the melody will resolve to the tonic in higher octave.

Kind: global mixin

Param Type Default Description
notes Array array of playable notes
timeInterval Number interval between each note in milli-seconds.
[resolve] boolean false whether to resolve to tonic

# playNotes

Play a group of notes Harmonically.

Kind: global mixin

Param Type Description
notes Array array of playable notes
duration string duration to play the notes for, e.g 4n.
